item.title: [PI] Model Error (Client Related)
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:7, topic:426520”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=529213.msg3861148#msg3861148 date=1324679533]

So in my inventory it looks like the New Dharok’s Greataxe,but when I wield it looks like the old one, And once again Both models are in the cache
[/quote]are we talking about how they are wielded ( aka animations ) or are we talking about the model itself?

in renamed clients generally the model ints go into item_def2 and animations go into class36/animation.java while gfx go into spotanim

Does anyone even use non-renamed anymore?[/quote]yes and no
while you mostly see non renamed they are generally used with runesource, delta, and allstar bases.

Read full topic

in renamed clients generally the model ints go into item_def2 and animations go into class36/animation.java while gfx go into spotanim[/quote]

item.title: [PI] Model Error (Client Related)
item.dc:creator: @propker212 propker212
item.description:
@propker212 wrote:

I recently moved this code in my Client.java

//From Here ModelDecompressor.hdgfx(); ModelDecompressor.loadModelz(); ModelDecompressor.loadModelz1(); ModelDecompressor.loadModelz3(); ModelDecompressor.loadModelz4(); ModelDecompressor.loadModelz5(); preloadModels(); //To Here
I did this so my New Dharok’s Greataxe Wield Model would load.
And it worked!!
Problem is, When I open up the bank it FREEZES and gives me this error…

If I did wrong in moving this code, Please tell me!
And how else can I fix this----
Only the NEW Dharok’s Inv model loads up. And and not the NEW Wield Model when I wield it, It shows up as the old Dharok’s Greataxe, And yes I put both models in Cache

Read full topic
